thread.section_title: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Professional and with a smile
thread.title_full: Professional and with a smile - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Roderick G
title: Professional and with a smile
text:
Consistency is important. Time and time again during my stay at the Homewood suites they have perform at a high standard in customer service for business, as well as family travels with hotel stay.
The rooms are spacious and comfortable.
Best of all after a good night rest is breakfast.
This hotel exceed expectation time and time again with high-quality breakfast. The staff is very accommodating, when my time is limited and can not stay for breakfast ,I am provided a to go container for take out.
When checking out you're always asking when will you join us again and thank you for staying with us.
They have earned my business again and again.
